Title: Prohibits the use of SUNY dormitories for the purposes of providing permanent or temporary housing for migrant populations
Summary: Prohibits the use of SUNY dormitories for the purposes of providing permanent or temporary housing for migrant populations; requests the board of trustees adopt a policy stating such.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting the use of SUNY dormitories for the purposes of providing permanent or temporary housing for migrant populations
